item.title: Lindenmayer Systems
item.description: A demo of the system described in this post. Refer to the source code for help. Simply enter the L-system grammar production rules, starting string and give the draw commands for each of the symbols in the grammar in a simple Logo-like language to generate beautiful patterns. Or, check out some of the presets. canvas#main-canvas { background-color: white; border: 1px solid black; max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; padding: 0.
